definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: To the grammar which assigns eliminates the left recursion.
sentences.chinese: 对给定的文法消除左递归。

sentences.english: Some arise from common law. Others are statutory.
sentences.chinese: 它们有些源起于普通法，其他则是属于成文法。

sentences.english: There's a kind of unwritten law about what to wear.
sentences.chinese: 关于穿什么有种不成文法。

sentences.english: This book is an introduction to English grammar.
sentences.chinese: 本书是英文文法的入门书。

sentences.english: I specialize in conversational English and can be particular with grammar and writing.
sentences.chinese: 我专攻英文会话，文法与写作。

sentences.english: He has limited English vocabularies and less knowledge on grammar in his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他认识的字既少，文法更提不到。

sentences.english: If you are attending school, you must go through the different stages of learning pronunciation, grammar and reading.
sentences.chinese: 假如你是上学的，你必经过发音，文法，阅读等程序。

sentences.english: In english grammar the gerund have exactly the same form as the present participle.
sentences.chinese: 英语文法中，动名词具有与现在分词完全一样的形式。

sentences.english: We don't need to learn grammar.
Remember that the type is defined only if you use a location in the grammar!
sentences.chinese: 记住，只有当您在文法中使用位置时才会定义类型。

sentences.english: It creates a parser object around a grammar.
sentences.chinese: 它围绕着文法创建解析器对象。

sentences.english: The powers and duties are confered on the tribunal by the statutory code.
sentences.chinese: 成文法典赋于法庭权力与责任。

sentences.english: It is useless to learn grammatical rules by rote.
sentences.chinese: 死记文法规则是没有用的。

sentences.english: Laws of different countries, therefore, almost always attempt to combine their written laws with their public orders and social customs.
sentences.chinese: 因此各国法律均注重公序良俗与成文法的兼容。

sentences.english: Meek is the principal of Geelong Grammar School (GGS), one of the best private schools in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 基隆文法学校是澳大利亚最好的私立学校之一。

sentences.english: Professors of composition talk about literature as carpenters talk about art.
sentences.chinese: 作文法教师的论文学，实等于木匠谈论美术。

definition: old language/the Classics/Classical Chinese as a literary model, esp. in Tang and Song prose/Classical Chinese as a school subject
to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
pausing at the end of a phrase or sentence (in former times, before punctuation marks were used)/punctuation/periods and commas/sentences and phrases
